entry.string: You master site directory #(1) does not exist! Please create it first!
entry.translation: Yuoo mester seete-a durectury #(1) dues nut ixeest! Pleese-a creete-a it furst!

entry.string: The Site Data Directory #(1) is not writeable!nPlease chmod 777 and try again.
entry.translation: Zee Seete-a Deta Durectury #(1) is nut vreeteeble-a!nPlease chmud 777 und try egeeen. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The master config.system.php file /var/config.system.php is not writeable!n Please chmod 666 and try again.
entry.translation: Zee mester config.system.php feele-a /var/config.system.php is nut vreeteeble-a!n Pleese-a chmud 666 und try egeeen. Bork bork bork!

entry.string: The Site Data Directory #(1)/#(2)/var is not writeable!
entry.translation: Zee Seete-a Deta Durectury #(1)/#(2)/fer is nut vreeteeble-a!
